ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent Cigarette as a tobacco smoking substance.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment, Performed for "Tobacco product" as an attribute of result. The intent of this data element is to identify cigarette as a tobacco smoking substance.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with SNOMED CT codes identifying cigarette as a tobacco smoking substance or product.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to tobacco products or substances other than cigarettes. (e.g. cigars).)
